languages.text: "Сраженный рукой Сирлаэль, опустился на колено мечник и признал ее мастерство. Был он не смертным, но творением богов, ведавшим почтение к совершенству. В награду за победу предложил он Сирлаэль дар — указал, где она сможет отыскать отмщение".

"Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."
languages.original_text: "Сраженный рукой Сирлаэль, опустился на колено мечник и признал ее мастерство. Был он не смертным, но творением богов, ведавшим почтение к совершенству. В награду за победу предложил он Сирлаэль дар — указал, где она сможет отыскать отмщение".

"Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."

languages.text: « Vaincu par la main de Sirlael, l'épéiste tomba à genoux et reconnut son talent. Il ne s'agissait pas d'un simple mortel, mais d'une création des dieux admirant toutes les choses parfaites. En guise de récompense, il lui indiqua comment se rendre dans un lieu qui lui permettrait d'accomplir sa vengeance. »
languages.original_text: "Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."

traits.locale_text: « Vaincu par la main de Sirlael, l'épéiste tomba à genoux et reconnut son talent. Il ne s'agissait pas d'un simple mortel, mais d'une création des dieux admirant toutes les choses parfaites. En guise de récompense, il lui indiqua comment se rendre dans un lieu qui lui permettrait d'accomplir sa vengeance. »

languages.text: “到最后，那位剑士被希蕾尔打败了。他跪在地上，承认了她的力量。那位剑士可不是什么凡人，而是神明的造物，崇尚一切完美无缺的东西。为了祝贺希蕾尔的胜利，他为希蕾尔指明了方向，告诉她应该去哪里完成她的复仇。”
languages.original_text: "Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."

traits.locale_text: “到最后，那位剑士被希蕾尔打败了。他跪在地上，承认了她的力量。那位剑士可不是什么凡人，而是神明的造物，崇尚一切完美无缺的东西。为了祝贺希蕾尔的胜利，他为希蕾尔指明了方向，告诉她应该去哪里完成她的复仇。”

languages.text: 「サーラエルに破れた剣士は、ひざまずいて彼女の腕を認めた。剣士はただの人間ではなく、神々の創造物であり、完璧なものすべてに敬意を払っていた。勝利の褒美として、彼はサーラエルにあることを教えた。それは彼女がヴェンジェンスを手に入れられる場所を示した道だった」
languages.original_text: "Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."

traits.locale_text: 「サーラエルに破れた剣士は、ひざまずいて彼女の腕を認めた。剣士はただの人間ではなく、神々の創造物であり、完璧なものすべてに敬意を払っていた。勝利の褒美として、彼はサーラエルにあることを教えた。それは彼女がヴェンジェンスを手に入れられる場所を示した道だった」

languages.text: "Bezwungen durch Sirlaels Hand ging der Schwertkämpfer vor ihr auf die Knie und erkannte ihre Fähigkeiten an. Er handelte sich um keinen gewöhnlichen Sterblichen, sondern um eine Schöpfung der Götter, die Respekt vor Makellosigkeit zeigen sollte. Als Belohnung für ihren Sieg bot er Sirlael ein Geschenk an – der Weg zu einem Ort, wo sie sich rächen konnte."
languages.original_text: "Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."

traits.locale_text: "Bezwungen durch Sirlaels Hand ging der Schwertkämpfer vor ihr auf die Knie und erkannte ihre Fähigkeiten an. Er handelte sich um keinen gewöhnlichen Sterblichen, sondern um eine Schöpfung der Götter, die Respekt vor Makellosigkeit zeigen sollte. Als Belohnung für ihren Sieg bot er Sirlael ein Geschenk an – der Weg zu einem Ort, wo sie sich rächen konnte."

languages.text: «Vencido por la mano de Sirlael, el espadachín se postró ante ella y reconoció su destreza. No se trataba de un simple mortal, sino de una creación divina con un profundo respeto por la perfección. En recompensa por su victoria, ofreció un regalo a Sirlael: el camino a un lugar que le permitiría cobrarse su venganza».
languages.original_text: "Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."

traits.locale_text: «Vencido por la mano de Sirlael, el espadachín se postró ante ella y reconoció su destreza. No se trataba de un simple mortal, sino de una creación divina con un profundo respeto por la perfección. En recompensa por su victoria, ofreció un regalo a Sirlael: el camino a un lugar que le permitiría cobrarse su venganza».

languages.text: "Sirlael'in elinde yenilgiyi tadan kılıç ustası, diz çöküp rakibinin hünerini kabullendi. Usta; sıradan bir ölümlü değil, tanrı tarafından kusursuz olan şeylerin yüzü suyu hürmetine yaratılmış bir lütuftu. Zaferi karşılığında Sirlael'e bir armağan sundu, Sirlael'in intikamını alacağı yere çıkan yolu gösterdi."
languages.original_text: "Bested by Sirlael's hand, the swordsman knelt and recognised her skill. He was no mere mortal but the gods' creation with respect for all things flawless. As a reward for her victory, he offered Sirlael a gift, the way to a place where she could claim her vengeance."
